### Top gene sets
```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| message: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
#| column: page
camera_all[[current_contrast]] %>%
  reactable(
    wrap = FALSE,
    resizable = TRUE,
    striped = TRUE,
    bordered = FALSE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    columns = list(
      `PValue` = colDef(cell = function(pval) {
        # Render as scientific format
        pval_format <- pval %>%
          format(digits = 3, scientific = TRUE, nsmall = 2)
      }),
      `FDR` = colDef(cell = function(pval) {
        # Render as scientific format
        pval_format <- pval %>%
          format(digits = 3, scientific = TRUE, nsmall = 2)
      })
    )
  )
```
